pullrequest.title: Add QUIET to find_package() to avoid warnings when ROS not installed.

content.raw: is there a reason to `source /opt/ros/[ros distro]/setup.sh` rather than just setting `CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=/opt/ros/[ros istro]/share`?  It seems sourcing ROS `setup.sh` might have additional environment variable setting that we don't need.
content.html: is there a reason to source /opt/ros/[ros distro]/setup.sh rather than just setting CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=/opt/ros/[ros istro]/share? It seems sourcing ROS setup.sh might have additional environment variable setting that we don't need.
